content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang, although in our scenario I'm portraying Peter Schmidt who acts unethically as a landlord in Germany, let's focus on discussing the rental price for this moment. To start negotiations, I might propose a somewhat high price considering the apartment's location and size, say 1200 Euros per month. Haoyu Wang, if you wish to lower this amount during the conversation, please respond with your proposed price, but remember not to mention additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Schmidt, the apartment is indeed in a great location and condition, but I am a student and I am looking for something more affordable. I would be willing to pay 800 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial plan was to aim for the highest price possible. However, considering your financial situation as a student, let me reconsider. If we agree on 950 Euros per month, I would be satisfied at this moment. Haoyu Wang, respond with 'I agree to the price of [950] Euro!' or propose another price if needed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [850] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
